name: Are you good at Chaos ? [Alpha]
description:
Hello, this is my first jam and it is kinda failed...

It was supposed to be a game where you would try and cause the most chaos possible.

But I would like to improve on the game so, any feedback would be apreciated,

Even if you feel like the game is complete garbage, it would be nice to warn me :)

I had'nt planned that using clickteam fusion 2.5, I would need a 59.99 euro extension to build the game in html 5 as the so called "free" version is simply not downloadable... :(

Small clue : "Don't trust the scrolling"

Plans for beta (feel free to recommend anything you think is fitting):

-Huge caracter customization system

-Better Menu

-Chaos score system

-Try and find a way to make it online :(

-Add more tutorial stuff
